overview: Use the miles in any combination that fits your schedule and your goals. Try a 1 Mile walk every morning to start your day the right way…or do a 2 Mile Walk before dinner…why not 3 Miles every Wednesday? There are so many combinations to keep things fresh and effective! It all WORKS to keep you walking strong and slim!
tagline: Burn AND Firm at the SAME TIME!
title: Leslie Sansone: 5 Mega Miles
